verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:17
verses.text: And David smote them from the twilight even unto the evening of the next day: and there escaped not a man of them, save four hundred young men, which rode upon camels, and fled.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:18
verses.text: And David recovered all that the Amalekites had carried away: and David rescued his two wives.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:19
verses.text: And there was nothing lacking to them, neither small nor great, neither sons nor daughters, neither spoil, nor any thing that they had taken to them: David recovered all.
